title: Drawing, "Album of Drawings: Sea, Coastline, Landscapes", 1860–90
medium: Brush and gouache, brush and watercolor, graphite on cream wove paper, two on blue paper, all laid down
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Forty-eight drawings mounted on thirty-seven leaves of white paper; twelve gouache and/or watercolor; thirty-six graphite (two on blue paper) bound in cardboard covers of an autograph album

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Album of Drawings: Sea, Coastline, Landscapes", 1860–90.
1860–90. Brush and gouache, brush and watercolor, graphite on cream wove paper, two on blue paper, all laid down. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-85.
